question_text: Select two best practices for network cable management:
answer_options: Using Velcro ties or cable organizers
Labeling both ends of each cable
Hiding cables under floor tiles without labels
Mixing fiber and copper cables in the same bundle
correct_answer: Using Velcro ties or cable organizers
Labeling both ends of each cable
explanation: Proper cable management uses ties/trays for neatness and labeling for identification.
